string.name: name
string.value: The Storybook on Kong Ji and Pat Ji
I'm sure I received the storybook after helping out Kong Ji. Where did it go? Should I go see Kong Ji again?

#b#p2040052## from Helios Tower Library has requested me to retrieve #b#t4031236##k. Hmmm ... I'm pretty sure I received it the last time I helped Kong Ji out, but I can't seem to find it. After discussing the matters with her, she promised to give me the storybook if I gather up #b5 #t4000166#s#k for her family dinner later tonight.\n\n#t4000166# #b#c4000166##k/5
I gave Kong Ji 5 #t4000166#s just as she requested to reacquire #t4031236#.
Long time no see~ What's going on? I can't thank you enough for your help last time! How can I help you today? Are you here to buy some stuff?
Did you lose the storybook that I gave you? Oh no... that's awful. My customers tell me that Wiz the Librarian is looking for that book. Is that the reason why came to see me?
Thankfully, I have an extra storybook. If you can help me out one last time, then I'll gladly give you the book. Will you help me out?

My stepmother told me this morning that she wanted some steamed shrimp, but I had so much work to do at home and I totally forgot about it. I went out later at night for some grocery shopping, but the merchants have all called it a day by then. I'll really appreciate it if you can get me #b5 #t4000166#s#k before dinner time, so I can prepare it for my stepmother. I'll give you another copy of the storybook then.
Didn't you say you needed the storybook? There have been rumors regarding #b#p2040052##k looking to re-collect all the storybooks... Aren't you here to help Wiz gather up the storybooks?
You came back just in time. I was beginning to worry about you. Did you manage to get #b#t4000166##k?
You must be really good at this. How did you do it? Not only that, but these are FRESH! Please take this storybook and go see Wiz.
I don't think you have gotten #b#t4000166##k, yet. It won't be easy to obtain, considering that the merchants have already called it a day. All I need are #b5#k...
